title: 이달의소녀탐구 #101 (LOONA TV #101)
summary:
It’s the beginning of the ViVi era!
0:03 -- ViVi waving hello (this is a freakin’ adorable wave).
0:07 -- ViVi checks her watch. ViVi is not wearing a watch. “It’s three thirty”
0:17 -- “It’s Like Train to Busan!” ViVi describes her love of zombies!
0:27 -- “I’m a fan of zombies” This is just a really cute declaration of love for murderous
people-eating monsters.
0:34 -- HaSeul declares that going to Busan is going to a foreign country for ViVi. The joke
totally flops.
0:46 -- The world’s weakest “hwaiting!” with HaSeul and ViVi
